name: Golf Series 2D
description:
Golf Series 2D

Golf Series 2D is a prototype of a 2D top-view golf game, the main goal is to complete all the levels in a minimal time and shots possible.

Features on Alpha 0.1 (current)

  • 4 playable levels
  • Ball physic depends on the ground (grass, parkour, wood, sand..)
  • Best run saved through a record panel on titleScreen

This project is only a prototype. If people see a least some interest in this one, then i'll continue to develop it.

Feel free to report me any issues/bugs that you could encounter, and why not ideas of features to add.
